SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client

Class HTTPResponse

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.client.HTTPResponse
public final class HTTPResponse extends Object
Represents an HTTP response status delivered to an HTTPResponseHandler.

This class provides only the essential status information. Individual headers are delivered separately via the HTTPResponseHandler.header(String, String) callback, which allows for streaming processing and proper handling of trailer headers.

For redirect responses, this class provides access to the redirect location and the chain of previous responses (for redirect following).

Thread Safety: This class is immutable and thread-safe.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Method Details

    • getStatus

      public HTTPStatus getStatus()
      Returns the HTTP status.
      Returns:
      the status (never null)

    • getRedirectLocation

      public String getRedirectLocation()
      Returns the redirect location for redirect responses (3xx).

      This is the value of the Location header for redirect responses, or null if this is not a redirect response or no Location was provided.

      Returns:
      the redirect location, or null

    • getPreviousResponse

      public HTTPResponse getPreviousResponse()
      Returns the previous response in a redirect chain.

      When the client follows redirects automatically, this provides access to the chain of redirect responses. Returns null if this is the first response (no redirects occurred) or redirect following is disabled.

      Returns:
      the previous response, or null

    • getRedirectCount

      public int getRedirectCount()
      Returns the number of redirects that occurred before this response.
      Returns:
      the redirect count (0 if no redirects)

    • isSuccess

      public boolean isSuccess()
      Returns true if this is a success response (2xx status).
      Returns:
      true for 2xx statuses

    • isRedirection

      public boolean isRedirection()
      Returns true if this is a redirect response (3xx status).
      Returns:
      true for 3xx statuses

    • isError

      public boolean isError()
      Returns true if this is an error response (4xx or 5xx status).
      Returns:
      true for 4xx or 5xx statuses
